translation.preferencias-opcao-02: Visual impairment (low vision, legal blindness or total blindness)
translation.home-subtitulo-01: Together, we can build a future where everyone
translation.home-subtitulo-02: has equal access to opportunities and progress.
translation.about-project-paragrafo-01: We are an educational platform containing games, dynamics, and courses aimed at helping the development of people with disabilities who want to learn about technology, equipped with didactic tools and constant communication during the playful process.
translation.about-project-paragrafo-02: With the aim of ensuring that all people have equal access to opportunities, resources, and participation in the technology market, not only including them but making them belong.
translation.identidade-apoio-significado: The hands symbolize solidarity and also unity around a common purpose.
translation.identidade-inclusao-significado: Symbolizing unity and mutual support among people, regardless of their differences.
translation.identidade-programacao-significado: Symbolizes the brand's focus on programming and technology.
translation.tipografia-anybody-descricao: AnyBody is a modern and versatile font, with a friendly and contemporary style.
translation.tipografia-jasmin-descricao: Jazmin Regular is a modern and elegant font, with rounded and smooth shapes, ideal for conveying a friendly image.
translation.planos-subtitulo-01: Choose the plan that best suits your needs and
translation.planos-subtitulo-02: make the most of our services.
translation.newsletter-subtitulo: Sign up for our newsletter and receive amazing content directly to your email. Don't miss the opportunity to stay up to date with our news!
